"Event name: Halloween Theme Part

"
"Venue: 5000 Forbes Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15213

" "Date and time: Thursday, October 31st 6:30 p.m. - 1:00 a.m.

" "Description: It's the annual Pumpkin Smash, so get ready for a monster mash dance!" "And donâ€™t forget, scare up a fright costumes are a must on this night!

" "Dress code: Casual

" "Target audience: Everyone

Welcome to Asgard Amazing Events Manager!


Are you confused about what to do after school or after work? Our amazing events manager notifies you of events that are happening nearby. Organisers upload events and you can view them at your will, register interested events and manage your events.


Are you worried about nobody will attend the event you hosted? Our amazing events manager is here to bring you close to all the people who use our app. Push them your events and prompt them to register.



Liqin Shan, Kai Qian, Shuqin Ye @ CMU
